comments.body:
You will likely be asked to add a license file because this package is GPL'd. You can add the license file by adding the following two lines here:

```
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'   # [unix]
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}\R\share\licenses\GPL-3' # [win]
```
none of the checks asked for it. But ok, lets add it!
In the future this will be done automatically with the helper script: https://github.com/bgruening/conda_r_skeleton_helper/pull/8

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +56,60 @@  license: GPL-3
  summary: Easily talk to Google's 'BigQuery' database from R.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'   # [unix]
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}\R\share\licenses\GPL-3'       # [win]
